name: Pocket Square
description:
12 classic games in one awesome package!

Each game is a classic you know and love, but with a twist. Pocket Square only has one button. Can you master these games and climb your way to the top of the leader-boards?

Controls:
Click Start/Select to pause and navigate the menus.

Click the big red button to select menu items and to play the games.

Alternatively you can press any key during a game to play or press SHIFT to pause and navigate the pause menu.
